Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface NetworkUser<ToSend,​ToReceive>

Type Parameters:
ToSend - this is the class used to send messages
ToReceive - this is the class used to receive messages
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientHandler, ClientNetwork, LocalClient, LocalClientHandler, WaitingRoom
public interface NetworkUser<ToSend,​ToReceive>
this interface represent a network user. in particular, every class that want to exchange messages, have to implement this interface, specifying the type of messages to send and to receive, that will be classes parsed in json

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ToReceive receiveMessage()
    this method receive a message from the network
    void send​(ToSend networkMessage)
    this method send a message to the network

  • Method Details

    • send

      void send​(ToSend networkMessage)
      this method send a message to the network
      Parameters:
      networkMessage - this is the message to send

    • receiveMessage

      ToReceive receiveMessage() throws java.io.IOException
      this method receive a message from the network
      Returns:
      the message received
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if a network error occurs
